info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 9:17AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Missoula, north central Ravalli and northwestern Granite Counties through 1000 AM MDT... At 917 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Victor, or 13 miles north of Hamilton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevensville, Victor, Florence, Pinesdale, Quigley and Bell Crossing. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 near mile marker 108. Highway 93 S between mile markers 53 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
